natural solution: Note that $f(x) = \sqrt[3]{20x + \sqrt[3]{20x + 13}}$ is an increasing function, so the solution to \[\sqrt[3]{20x + \sqrt[3]{20x + 13}} = 13\]is unique. Furthermore, if $\sqrt[3]{20x + 13} = 13,$ then $x$ satisfies the given equation.
